request.description: Implement AI-Powered Auto-Regulation in WorkoutLogger: Add database schema (autoRegulationRecommendations table), backend API (convex/autoRegulation.ts with queries, mutations, GPT-5-mini action), frontend components (AutoRegulationCard + WorkoutStartScreen integration), and E2E testing. Plan available in linked memory PLAN_AUTOREGULATION_IMPLEMENTATION_20251209.
